title: CSS
subTitle: Creating responsive, performant, and maintainable designs with CSS3
overviewContent: Expertly craft responsive user interfaces using CSS3, leveraging media queries to ensure layouts adapt seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Applied advanced layout techniques including flexbox and grid, while optimising styles for performance and maintainability. Collaborated closely with designers and front-end developers to translate visual concepts into functional, visually coherent web applications. Emphasised modular, reusable CSS and adhered to best practices to support long-term project scalability and high-quality user experience.
